meanings.definition: One that lays: a layer of bricks.
meanings.sent1: The worker carefully placed each layer of bricks on the wall.
meanings.sent2: The painter applied a fresh layer of paint to the wall.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel decided to hide its acorns under a layer of leaves.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a layer of sunshine on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: The cake was so delicious, with each layer adding a burst of flavor.

meanings.definition: A single thickness of a material covering a surface: a layer of paint.
meanings.sent1: The artist added another layer of paint to the canvas.
meanings.sent2: The snow covered the ground with a thick layer of white.
meanings.sent3: The cat left a layer of fur on the couch after napping.
meanings.sent4: His lies were like a layer of deceit hiding the truth.
meanings.sent5: The blanket provided a warm layer of comfort on the cold night.

meanings.definition: A level of material, such as rock or soil, that is different from the material above or below it: a layer of sediment.
meanings.sent1: The archaeologists discovered a layer of ancient artifacts buried in the ground.
meanings.sent2: The geologist studied the different layers of rock in the canyon.
meanings.sent3: The kids had fun digging through the layer of sand at the beach.
meanings.sent4: His emotions were like layers of sediment, buried deep within.
meanings.sent5: The history of the town was written in the layers of its buildings.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that lays: a layer of eggs.
meanings.sent1: The hen proudly sat on her nest, keeping her eggs warm in the layer of straw.
meanings.sent2: The spider carefully spun a delicate layer of silk to catch its prey.
meanings.sent3: The chef cracked the eggs into a layer of hot butter in the pan.
meanings.sent4: The artist's brush created a beautiful layer of colors on the canvas.
meanings.sent5: The gardener planted a layer of seeds in the freshly tilled soil.
